lang.name: English (United Kingdom)
global.donatorsOnly: This feature is reserved to donators only.
about.title: {{{ emote }}} Information about {{{ name }}}:
about.embed.text:
Hello!
I am a general purpose bot for all Discord communities.
I provide you necessary tools to meet your needs, from utility to fun features you can fully enjoy me.
You can get below some useful information about me.
afk.gone: üí§ You have gone AFK, see you later!
afk.messageTooLong: The message length must be fewer than 256 characters.
antighost.alert: üëª You were mentioned in {{{ name }}}'s message but it has been deleted:
antighost.main: üëª Anti-ghost ping feature: run `{{{ command }}}` for more information.
antighost.enabled: The anti-ghost ping feature has been enabled!
antighost.disabled: The anti-ghost ping feature has been disabled!
antighost.enabledAlready: The anti-ghost ping feature is already enabled.
antighost.disabledAlready: The anti-ghost ping feature is already disabled.
antighost.info:
üëª The anti-ghost ping feature tracks for message deletions, if you were mentioned in a message that has been deleted within the hour it was sent, Homer will alert you about this so you will know why you have received a notification.
‚óª If someone abuses of the system to spam you, please disable the feature and report the concerned user on the assistance server.
antighost.dm: This command must be ran in private messages with the bot.
archive.embed.instructions:
React with üìÑ to export the channel messages into a text file.
Otherwise, react with {{{ error }}}.
archive.embed.footer: You are limited to one archive per hour per server.
archive.success: The channel messages have been archived successfully.
archive.cancelled: You have cancelled the channel archive request.
archive.dumpInProgress: Dump in progress... It can take a lot of time, be patient.
archive.error: An error occured during the dump, please retry again later.
archive.calmDown: An archive has already been started less than an hour ago in this server.
archive.noMessageDumped: No message could be dumped from the given channel (embeds are not supported).
archive.permissionsUser: You must have the **View Channel** and **Read Messages History** permissions in the given channel.
archive.permissionsBot: The bot needs the **View Channel** and **Read Message History** permissions in the given channel.

donators.text:
Homer is a free Discord bot developed by a student on a voluntary basis.
Despite the motivation to maintain the bot, the hosting of the bot remains paid.
You can help me finance the hosting of the bot by making a donation, you will enjoy some nice little benefits that you find just below.
The minimum amount, which allows you to take advantage of the advantages, is 2‚Ç¨ but you can give more according to your desires.

Thank you very much, ‚ù§
iDroid.

**[Secured donation link]({{{ link }}})**
donators.perk.3: Longer time detection in anti-ghost ping

format.title: üìÜ Formats for {{{ name }}}:
format.embed.explanation:
This command allows you to customize the format of date and time shown in various commands such as `user`.
You can change these settings using `{{{ prefix }}}format date` and `{{{ prefix }}}format time`.
Check the documentation below to set the list of vars usable, don't touch if you're not sure.

format.date.tooLong: The length of the date format must be fewer than 64 characters

format.time.noFormat: You must provide a time format to set
format.time.tooLong: The length of the time format must be fewer than 64 characters
format.time.set: The time format has been set to `{{{ format }}}`

help.title: üìö Help for **{{{ name }}}**
help.advancedHelp: Get advanced help on a command using `{{{ command }}}` where command can be any command above.

helpUtil.contacts: Search for people in your contacts book
helpUtil.format: Manage the date and time formats
helpUtil.help: Displays the help for the bot
helpUtil.ignore: Ignores a user or a channel

helpUtil.ignore.channel: Add or remove a channel on the ignored list
helpUtil.ignore.command: Add or remove a command on the ignored list
helpUtil.invite: Invite the bot to your server
helpUtil.language.list: Displays all available languages on Homer
helpUtil.leave.clear: Clear the leave message (disable the feature)
helpUtil.lookup: Get information on user IDs, guild IDs and invites
helpUtil.phblacklist: Manage blacklist for the current phone subscription
helpUtil.phmessage: Manage messages used by the telephone
helpUtil.phonebook: Browse through the Homer telephone book
helpUtil.poll: Run advanced polls with desired options
helpUtil.profile: Get the profile of a user
helpUtil.profile.fields: Get the list of available profile fields
helpUtil.quote: Fetches a message using its Discord ID
helpUtil.radio: Listen to radios in voice channel
helpUtil.radio.list: Get the list of available radios
helpUtil.radio.tune: Tune into the given radio station
helpUtil.radio.stop: Stop the current broadcast and leaves the channel
helpUtil.radio.info: Show info on the radio currently played
helpUtil.radio.discover: Discover programmes to listen via Homer radio
helpUtil.report: Flag users who violate Homer rules (telephone, tags, etc)
helpUtil.role.members: Get the list of all members having the specified role
helpUtil.role.list: List all roles on a server
helpUtil.roleme.list: Get a list of all roleme available roles
helpUtil.roleme.add: Add a role to the roleme list
helpUtil.roleme.remove: Remove a role from the roleme list
helpUtil.rss: Stay tuned from your favourite places using Homer's RSS feature

helpUtil.rss.list: List all active RSS feeds in a channel
helpUtil.rss.add: Add an RSS feed to a channel
helpUtil.rss.remove: Remove an RSS feed from a channel
helpUtil.server.staff: All online staff on the server
helpUtil.server.emotes: List all emotes of the server
helpUtil.tag: Run tags, powered by Lisa - a JagTag port
helpUtil.tag.owner: Get the owner of a tag
helpUtil.tag.raw: Get the raw content of a tag
helpUtil.tag.raw2: Get the raw content of a tag in a code-block
helpUtil.tag.list: List all tags made by the given user
helpUtil.tag.import: Import a tag as a custom command
helpUtil.tag.unimport: Remove a tag from the custom commands
helpUtil.tag.commands: Get the list of tag commands (imported).
helpUtil.tag.exec: Run a tag without creating it (allows Lisa code)
helpUtil.tag.domains: Get the list of whitelisted domains for the `http` method
helpUtil.telephone.phonebook: Set your phonebook's description (or "off" to not appear on it)
helpUtil.telephone.text: Switch the text message option for the current subscription
helpUtil.text: Send a text message to someone
helpUtil.timefor: Get current time for a user
helpUtil.translate: Translate the given text into the specified language
helpUtil.vip: Get the list of VIPs on Homer
helpUtil.weather: Get current weather for the specified location
helpUtil.welcome.clear: Clear the welcome message (disable the feature)

telephone.terminate.cancelled: You have cancelled your termination to the telephone.
telephone.terminate.confirmation: To confirm your termination, react with {{{ success }}}. Otherwise, react with {{{ error }}}.
telephone.phonebook.noMessage: You must provide a phonebook message to set, put `off` to not appear on the phonebook anymore.
telephone.phonebook.messageTooLong: The phonebook message length must be fewer than 64 characters
telephone.phonebook.alreadyDisabled: You are already out of the phonebook.
telephone.phonebook.disabled: You will no longer appear on the phonebook.
telephone.phonebook.enabled: The message for your phonebook entry has been successfully updated!
telephone.text.enabled: You can now receive text messages from other people.
telephone.text.disabled: You will no longer receive text messages from other people.
telephone.text.mustEnable: You must enable receiving text messages to be able to send one.
telephone.change.success: You have successfully changed your number to `{{{ number }}}`.
telephone.change.alreadyExists: A subscription already exists with the number `{{{ number }}}`.
telephone.change.wrongFormat: Wrong format, the number must be like `XXX-XXX` with only alphanumeric characters (excluding underscores).
telephone.change.notOwner: You must be the owner of the telephone line to change the number of.
telephone.change.noNumber: You must provide a new number to set.
text.sent: Text message successfully sent to {{{ identity }}}!
text.title: üìß Text message by {{{ user }}} from {{{ identity }}}:
text.footer: You can answer to this message using {{{ command }}}.
text.noNumber: You must provide the number to text.
text.noText: You must provide the text to send.
text.textTooLong: The text length must be fewer than 256 characters.
text.cannotSend: Unable to send the text message to your correspondent.
timefor.title: üïê Current time for {{{ name }}}: {{{ time }}}
timefor.noSettings: No settings found for {{{ name }}}. To set your timezone, run `{{{ command }}}` in **Direct Messages**.
timezone.noTimezone: You must provide a timezone to set. Find timezones using `{{{ command }}}`.
timezone.invalidTimezone: The timezone `{{{ timezone }}}` is not recognized!
timezone.setTimezone: The server timezone has been set to `{{{ timezone }}}`.
timezone.search.noSearch: You must provide (a part of) a timezone to search.
timezone.search.invalidSearch: The length must be greater than 4 characters **and** fewer than 64 characters.
translate.noTargetLanguage: You must provide a target language (ISO 639-1 format)
translate.invalidTarget: The specified target language is not valid
translate.noText: You must provide a text to translate
translate.textTooLong: The text length must be fewer than 512 characters
translate.title: Translated text (`{{{ targetLanguage }}}`):
translate.error: An error occured during the translation! Please check if you use a correct target language code
translate.footer: Translation provided by Google Translate API
user.title: {{{ emote }}} Information about {{{ name }}}:
vip.title: üéñ VIPs on **{{{ name }}}**:
vip.embed.description:
VIPs have a special rank, for the moment there are no perks.
The only thing they have is a cool badge on their user info.
Give me ideas about what I could add to the list of perks!
vip.noPeople: There is no VIPs at the moment.
weather.title: üå• Weather for {{{ location }}}:
weather.unknownLocation: No location found with the given search
weather.noSearch: You must provide a location to search
weather.queryTooLong: The location length must be fewer than 64 characters
welcome.messageSet: The welcome message has been set!
welcome.noMessage: You must provide a message to set.
welcome.messageTooLong: The message length must be fewer than 256 characters.
welcome.channel.set: The welcome channel has been set to {{{ name }}}.
welcome.clear.noMessage: There is no welcome message set.
welcome.clear.cleared: The welcome message has been cleared.
youtube.noSearch: You must provide a content to search on YouTube.
youtube.searchTooLong: The search length must be fewer than 128 characters.
youtube.error: An error occured while searching on YouTube!
youtube.noResult: No result found matching the given search.
